name: Disc Brawl Online Discus Throw
description:
Disc Brawl Online is a fast-paced action-sports game that pits 2-4 players against each other in a frantic combination of air hockey and tennis. Players scramble to catch and throw a glowing disc while unleashing devastating abilities and power slides and defending their end zone. This is an exciting blend of strategy and skill, in this arcade game you can challenge your friends and compete with other players worldwide

FEATURES

Fast-paced arcade-inspired gameplay
Invite your friends to a party and play against other teams online
4 different characters with many costumes

Become a true champion in the sport of tomorrow where all that stands between you and a flaming throwing disc is the mid-court net.
